name: xcode
title: Xcode
description: Search and open your recent Xcode Projects, manage your Simulators & Apps, view the latest Releases, create Swift Packages & Playgrounds and quickly clear Xcode cache files.
author: SvenTiigi

commands.name: show-recent-projects-in-menu-bar.command
commands.title: Show Recent Projects in Menu Bar
commands.subtitle: Xcode
commands.description: View and open your recent Xcode Projects from the menu bar.

preferences.name: showRecentProjectsInMenuBar_projectsLimit
preferences.title: Number of visible recent projects
preferences.description: Select the amount of recent projects that should be shown in the menu bar.

commands.name: search-recent-projects.command
commands.title: Search Recent Projects
commands.subtitle: Xcode
commands.description: Search and open your recent Xcode Projects.

preferences.name: excludedXcodeProjectPaths
preferences.title: Excluded Xcode Project paths (comma separated)
preferences.description: A comma separated list of directory paths that should be excluded when searching for recent Xcode Projects.

preferences.name: terminalApp
preferences.title: Terminal App
preferences.description: Select which Terminal App to use when opening with a terminal

commands.name: show-swift-package-dependencies.command
commands.title: Show Swift Package Dependencies
commands.subtitle: Xcode
commands.description: Show Swift Package Dependencies of a Xcode Project.

commands.name: show-recent-builds-in-menu-bar.command
commands.title: Show Recent Builds in Menu Bar
commands.subtitle: Xcode
commands.description: View and open your recent builds from the menu bar.

commands.name: search-recent-builds.command
commands.title: Search Recent Builds
commands.subtitle: Xcode
commands.description: Search recent builds which are installed in a Xcode Simulator.

commands.name: list-apple-devices.command
commands.title: List Apple Devices
commands.subtitle: Xcode
commands.description: List Apple devices with their product name and device code name.

commands.name: manage-runtimes.command
commands.title: Manage Runtimes
commands.subtitle: Xcode
commands.description: Manage your Xcode Runtimes.

commands.name: manage-simulators.command
commands.title: Manage Simulators
commands.subtitle: Xcode
commands.description: Manage your Xcode Simulators.

commands.name: search-xcode-releases.command
commands.title: Search Xcode Releases
commands.subtitle: Xcode
commands.description: Search, download and view the latest Xcode Releases.

commands.name: open-developer-documentation.command
commands.title: Open Developer Documentation
commands.subtitle: Xcode
commands.description: Open Apple Developer Documentation.

commands.name: add-swift-package.command
commands.title: Add Swift Package
commands.subtitle: Xcode
commands.description: Add a Swift Package from an URL to a Xcode Project.

commands.name: create-swift-package.command
commands.title: Create Swift Package
commands.subtitle: Xcode
commands.description: Create a new Swift Package and open it directly in Xcode.

commands.name: create-swift-playground.command
commands.title: Create Swift Playground
commands.subtitle: Xcode
commands.description: Create a new Swift Playground and open it directly in Xcode.

preferences.name: playgroundDefaultLocation
preferences.title: Default location
preferences.description: Set the default location in which you want to save your Playgrounds.

commands.name: search-code-snippets.command
commands.title: Search Code Snippets
commands.subtitle: Xcode
commands.description: Search user defined Xcode Code Snippets.

commands.name: create-code-snippet.command
commands.title: Create Code Snippet
commands.subtitle: Xcode
commands.description: Create a new user defined Xcode Code Snippet.

commands.name: open-url-in-simulator.command
commands.title: Open URL in Simulator
commands.subtitle: Xcode
commands.description: Open the given URL in Simulator.

commands.name: clear-derived-data.command
commands.title: Clear Derived Data
commands.subtitle: Xcode
commands.description: Removes the ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData directory.

commands.name: clear-swift-package-manager-cache.command
commands.title: Clear Swift Package Manager Cache
commands.subtitle: Xcode
commands.description: Removes the ~/Library/Caches/org.swift.swiftpm directory.

commands.name: clear-swift-ui-previews-cache.command
commands.title: Clear SwiftUI Previews Cache
commands.subtitle: Xcode
commands.description: Removes the ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/UserData/Previews directory.

commands.name: delete-unsupported-simulators.command
commands.title: Delete Unsupported Simulators
commands.subtitle: Xcode
commands.description: Deletes devices that are not supported by the current Xcode SDK.

commands.name: delete-unsupported-runtimes.command
commands.title: Delete Unsupported Runtimes
commands.subtitle: Xcode
commands.description: Deletes runtimes that are not supported by the current Xcode SDK.

tools.name: xcode-projects
tools.title: Xcode Projects
tools.description: The recently opened Xcode Projects, Swift Packages, Xcode Workspaces or Swift Playgrounds.
tools.instructions:
Returns the Xcode projects.

@param input, ,The input.

filter.description: The filter to apply to only return Xcode projects of a certain type.

limit.description: The number of Xcode projects to return.

tools.name: xcode-swift-package-resolved
tools.title: Swift Package Dependencies
tools.description: The Swift Package dependencies of a Xcode Project, Xcode Workspace or Swift Package.
tools.instructions:
Retrieves the Swift Package Resolved file for an Xcode project.

@param input, ,The input.

xcodeProjectDirectoryPath.description: The path to the directory containing the Xcode project.

tools.name: boot-xcode-simulator
tools.title: Boot a Xcode Simulator
tools.description: Boots the Xcode Simulator by its udid.
tools.instructions:
Boots an Xcode Simulator via its UDID.

@param input, ,The input.

xcodeSimulatorUDID.description: The udid of the Xcode Simulator to boot.

tools.name: shutdown-xcode-simulator
tools.title: Shutdown a Xcode Simulator
tools.description: Shutdowns the Xcode Simulator by its udid.
tools.instructions:
Shuts down an Xcode Simulator via its UDID.

@param input

xcodeSimulatorUDID.description: The udid of the Xcode Simulator to shut down.

tools.name: restart-xcode-simulator
tools.title: Restart a Xcode Simulator
tools.description: Restarts the Xcode Simulator by its udid.
tools.instructions:
Restarts an Xcode Simulator via its UDID.

@param input, ,The input.

xcodeSimulatorUDID.description: The udid of the Xcode Simulator to restart.

tools.name: open-url-in-xcode-simulator
tools.title: Open a URL in a Xcode Simulator
tools.description: Opens a URL in a Xcode Simulator either a specific one identified by its udid or the currently booted one, if any.
tools.instructions:
Opens a URL in the Xcode Simulator.

@param input, ,The input.

url.description: The URL to open in the Xcode Simulator.

xcodeSimulatorUDID.description: The optional udid of the Xcode Simulator to open the URL in.

tools.name: xcode-simulator-applications
tools.title: Xcode Simulator Builds
tools.description: The builds / apps installed on a Xcode simulator.
tools.instructions: Returns the Xcode Simulator applications / builds.

tools.name: xcode-add-swift-package
tools.title: Add Swift Package
tools.description: Adds a Swift Package to an Xcode project (*.xcodeproj) or Xcode workspace (*.xcworkspace) using its HTTPS or SSH URL.
tools.instructions:
Adds a Swift Package to an Xcode project or workspace.

@param input, ,The input.

swiftPackageUrl.description: The URL of the Swift Package must be either an HTTPS or SSH URL to a Git repository that contains a "Package.swift" file.

xcodeProjectFilePath.description:
The file path to either an Xcode project (XcodeProjectType.project) or workspace (XcodeProjectType.workspace) where the Swift Package should be added.
The Xcode project must either be a .xcodeproj or .xcworkspace file.

tools.name: clear-swift-package-manager-cache
tools.title: Clear Swift Package Manager Cache
tools.description: Clears the Swift Package Manager cache directory.
tools.instructions: Clears the Swift Package Manager cache directory.

tools.name: clear-swift-ui-previews-cache
tools.title: Clear SwiftUI Previews Cache
tools.description: Clears the SwiftUI previews cache directory.
tools.instructions: Clears the SwiftUI previews cache directory.

tools.name: open-path
tools.title: Open Path
tools.description: Opens a file path which either points to a file for example a Xcode Project (*.xcodeproj), Swift Package (Package.swift), Xcode Workspace (*.xcworkspace), Swift Playground (*.playground) or a directory.
tools.instructions:
Opens a path which either points to a directory, Xcode Project, Swift Package (Package.swift), Xcode Workspace, Swift Playground or a file.

@param input, ,The input.

path.description: The path which either points to a directory, Xcode Project, Swift Package (Package.swift), Xcode Workspace, Swift Playground or a file.

evals.input: @xcode what dependencies does my current project use?
@xcode restart all simulators that are currently running
@xcode open maps:// in my current simulator
@xcode what apps are installed on my simulators?
@xcode what's the latest version of Xcode available?
@xcode clean up all my Xcode caches and derived data
